title: How to become an avid reader - Quora

response.answer_text: You acquire the reading habit by reading for pleasure. Start by reading books you enjoy. Don’t force yourself to read “serious literature.” That makes reading feel like taking medicine. Reading refines your sensibilities. It’s a natural process. You start to appreciate good writing and gravitate toward better books. Who knows, you might find yourself reading the classics. By that time you’ll be reading because you love it.
